title: Melee Damage Bonus +10
content:
Melee Damage Bonus: +10 You have a +10 bonus to damage rolls you make with Heavy melee weapons.

Melee Damage Bonus: +10

You have a +10 bonus to damage rolls you make with Heavy melee weapons.

Melee Damage Bonus: +10 is a Class Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Melee Damage Bonus: +10 is granted by the Great Weapon Master Feat. Features provide unique abilities that are inherent to a Character's Race, Class, Background selected. These may vary greatly, from allowing you to equip certain Weapons or p
